text:
@TexasTribune @GregAbbott_TX @realDonaldTrump 

Gov. Abbott is one of many assholes like Trump who wanted states to open up for business -- how convenient to blame under-30s or anyone else but themselves -- meanwhile the country is projected to have 200,000 COVID-19 deaths by Oct. 1 ...
